com.example.cmput301w21t23_smartdatabook.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.cmput301w21t23_smartdatabook.database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    class: Database This class consists database, it has the attributes call back which handles synchronous and asychronous functions, and an arraylist of experiment It passes/ takes information to firestore

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database()
      Main function does most of database's tasks
